segments.text: I spot the open cabinets and the cookie jar first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's overflowing with treats, looks delicious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then my eyes go to the sink area.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is flooding out, soaking everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman dries her plate calmly amid the flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not hear or feel it?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy climbs higher on the shaky stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate like a shield.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below waits patiently for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their cooperation is adorable in a way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I worry the stool will give way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Falling on wet tiles would hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is spreading toward them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden bushes sway gently.
segments.speaker: PAR
